hire.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to pay money to borrow something for a short period of time
hire.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The best way to explore the island is to hire a car.
What does it cost to hire a boat for a week?
hire.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to employ someone for a short time to do a particular job
hire.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Employers hire skilled people on fixed-term contracts.
A City lawyer has been hired to handle the case.
hire.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Businesses may only hire foreign workers where an American cannot be found.
the power to hire and fire (=employ and dismiss people)
hire.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an arrangement in which you pay a sum of money to borrow something for a short time
hire.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The crane is on hire from a local firm.
hire.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to employ a person or an organization for a short time to do a particular job for you
hire.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: The company has hired an investment banking firm to assist with managing its pension fund.
hire.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: to agree to give someone a permanent job
hire.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: The company has just hired 250 new staff.
The board hashired and fired a number of top chief executives in the past few years.
He was hired as the company’s chairman last year.
hire.translation[2].definitions[2].defin: to pay money to use something for a period of time
hire.translation[2].definitions[2].examp: You can hire a car at the airport.
hire.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: an arrangement by which someone borrows something for a period of time in exchange for money
hire.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: All our equipment is available for hire.
The engine is on hire from a local firm.
We want to keep hire charges on plant and machinery to a minimum.
hire.translation[3].definitions[1].defin: someone who starts to work for an organization
hire.translation[3].definitions[1].examp: The firm’s hires included economist Richard Hoey and investment strategist Joseph Cohen.
Nearly half Andersen’s new hires are women.
